mapper.insert: INSERT INTO credits(no, user_no, bank_no, num, cvc, due_month, due_year, basic, eng_name, regdate) VALUES(credits_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{bankNo}, #{num}, #{cvc}, #{dueMonth}, #{dueYear}, 'D', #{engName}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT c.no, user_no userNo, b.name bankName, num, cvc, due_month dueMonth, due_year dueYear, basic, eng_name engName, c.regdate, b.name FROM credits c, banks b WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND c.bank_no = b.no AND c.basic = 'D'
